title: The Plan
summaries: The Plan is a Hardmode accessory which combines the functions of the Fast Clock and the Trifold Map, granting immunity to the Slow and Confusion debuffs.
It is one of the ingredients required to make the Ankh Charm, which is further required to make the Ankh Shield.

statistics.Sell: 2
